context: A suspicious ransomware behavior was detected on the file system of the host `vnevado-win11u`, which might indicate mass encryption of files by ransomware. This potential ransomware activity could be indicative of ransomware activity. Following this, a suspicious WMI process creation was observed on the same machine at around the same time. Malware frequently uses WMI to spawn new processes, breaking process trees and further infecting a machine.
question: Can you identify the hostname of the machine where the suspicious WMI process creation was last observed?
solution_steps: Suspicious file system changes indicating potential ransomware activity were detected on the host `vnevado-win11u`.
A suspicious WMI process creation was observed on the machine associated with the account with SID `S-1-5-21-1840191660-8534830288-125585561-1522`.
A suspicious WMI process creation was observed on the host `vnevado-win11t`.
